blockchain_requests_results: CREATE TABLE `blockchain_requests_results` ( `idBlockchain_requests_results` int(11) NOT NULL, `check_performed` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `certified_data` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `missing_data` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `report` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL, `deviceId` varchar(45) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idBlockchain_requests_results`));
Blockchain_verification_requests: CREATE TABLE `Blockchain_verification_requests` ( `idBlockchain_verification_requests` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `device_id` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `start_date` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `end_date` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `request_status` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `owner_id` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `check_performed` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `certified_data` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `missing_data` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `report` longtext DEFAULT NULL, `report_missing` longtext DEFAULT NULL, `elapsed_time` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `elapsed_time_compare` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `median_api_calls_bc_time` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `median_api_calls_snap_time` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idBlockchain_verification_requests`));
devicecheck: CREATE TABLE `devicecheck` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`uri` varchar(100) NOT NULL,`checkdate` datetime NOT NULL,`organization` varchar(65) DEFAULT NULL,`log` varchar(145) DEFAULT NULL,`isInDB` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`isInKB` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`isInOwnership` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`haveURI` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,`isInBroker` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`));
